description: This Java class defines a request for getting system status information in a Zigbee simulation framework, including methods to execute the request and retrieve various system parameters.

classes.name: GetSystemStatusRequest
classes.description: A request class to obtain the system status, extending the base Request class, with an execute method that sends a response with system parameters.

methods.name: GetSystemStatusRequest(int requestId)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with the given request ID.

methods.name: execute()
methods.description: Executes the request, retrieving system status data from MockZigbeeCore and sending a response.
